from itertools import chain,combinations
# Build the sequence
lucky = []

for i in xrange(1,14):
	lucky.append(5 ** i)
def all_subsets(ss):
	return chain(*map(lambda x: combinations(ss,x),range(2,len(ss))))
for tup in all_subsets(lucky):
	lucky.append(sum(tup))
lucky.sort()

limit = int(raw_input())
for i in xrange(limit):
	number = int(raw_input()) -1
	print lucky[number]
